author: vkuznet
body: This PR contains changes to cmsweb frontend to enable x509-scitokens support. This PR partially overlaps with Alan's PR: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/4479 where we added plenty of specs to build crytography libs. To do that openssl spec was required to be changed to support ec and other functionality.
title: Specs/changes to support x509-scitokens-issuer in cmsweb frontend
